data.text:
th May 2022. This amazingly melodious event has been bestowed a place in ‘Gold Edition’ being amazingly inimitable. The event is vigorously planned to reveal their professional excellence by the young music directors Ashveen Kaur and Jaskaran Singh responsible for the musical aspects under the virtuous directions of Biba Bhupinder Kaur.

The Guru was a renowned & deeply respected peace-builder of his time. Through countless practical initiatives, he promoted the principle of ‘Sarbat da Bhala, serving the wider welfare of all - added Bhai Sahib Dr. Mohinder Singh Ji, OBE, KSG, the Noble Patron of Global Sikh Vision.

The Certificate of Records (Gold Edition) was presented to Mr. Ravinder Pal Singh Kohli (CEO, Global Sikh Vision) by Mr. Raj Tripathi (Official Adjudicator, World Book of Records – London) in the gracious presence of Sir John Crabtree OBE, Lord-Lieutenant of West Midlands, Mr. Simon Foster, Police and Crime Commissioner, West Midlands Police, Mr. Surjit Singh Uppal of GTB Gurdwara, various dignitaries and community leaders.

On being recognised by the World Book of Records, London (UK), the dignitaries of Global Sikh Vision were congratulated by Shri. Virendra Sharma (Member of Parliament, England), Dr. Diwakar Sukul (Chairman, World Book of Records, London), Shri. Santosh Shukla, Supreme Court Advocate (President, World Book of Records).

","record_date":"2022-05-28","created":"2023-01-23","record_category":"0","show_on_achieving_lorel":"0","type":"","status":"Active","modified_date":"2023-02-10 13:28:40","modified_by":"0","is_deleted":"0","deleted_by":"0","delete_date":""},{"id":"1003","record_holder":"Prime Minister Modi’s presence etches Record of Karnataka Government by World Book of Records","url":"prime-minister-modi---s-presence-etches-record-of-karnataka-government-by-world-book-of-records1003","sort":null,"image":"eb0d6-prime-minister-modis-presence.jpeg","description":" Governor of Karnataka Shri Thawar Chand Gehlot, Chief Minister of Karnataka Shri Basvaraj Bommai, Union Minister of State Shri Bhagwant Khuba and Ministers from the Karnataka Government among others were present on occasion.

Kalaburagi (Karnataka): Barrister Santosh Shukla (President and CEO, World Book of Records) has announced that Prime Minister Narendra Modi has bestowed 51000 title deeds (Hakku Patra) to the eligible beneficiaries of newly declared revenue villages of Karnataka gets included in the World Book of Records. The Revenue Department Karnataka organized Alemari Soorininda Susthira Oorinedege (Transforming Hamlets to Revenue Villages) issuing Title Deed (Hakku Patra) to 51000 families on 19 January 2023.

On this occasion, Shri R.K. Ashok Jee (Cabinet Minister - Revenue), Shri Murukesh Nirani Jee (Cabinet Minister - Small and Micro Industries MSME), Shri Yashwanth Jee, IAS (District Collector), Shri Sharanabasappa Jee (Additional Commissioner) received the World Book of Records certificate. Mr. Shukla briefed the World Book of Record is an international certification organization that was conceptualized and launched from Indore (Madhya Pradesh) India. In the short span, the organization got a meteoric rise with dedication and commitment to serve people across the world. The organization has made its strong presence at continental contours. On being recognized by World Book of Records, London (UK), Shri R.K. Ashok (Cabinet Minister - Revenue) was congratulated by members of the Central Working Committee of WBR and other dignitaries from international scenarios. Prime Minister Narendra Modi also congratulated the Banjara Community on 3000 Tanda habitation becoming revenue villages. #WBR

","record_date":"2023-01-19","created":"2023-01-23","record_category":"1","show_on_achieving_lorel":"0","type":"","status":"Active","modified_date":"2023-02-10 13:28:40","modified_by":"0","is_deleted":"0","deleted_by":"0","delete_date":""},{"id":"1004","record_holder":"Child Prodigy Master Siddhesh Sachin Niphadkar of (Pune) Maharashtra gets included by World Book of Records","url":"child-prodigy-master-siddhesh-sachin-niphadkar-of--pune--maharashtra-gets-included-by-world-book-of-records1004","sort":null,"image":"01913-2d8d4b46-97d2-41ca-b88a-6b73fbebfbec.jpg","description":" For covering 235.7 km nonstop journey by bicycle in 11 hours 57 minutes from Nigdi-Pandharpur, Maharashtra at the age of 14 years 3 months 14 days.

Pune : Barrister Santosh Shukla (President and CEO, World Book of Records) has announced that Child Prodigy Master Siddhesh Sachin Niphadkar of (Pune) Maharashtra has been included by World Book of Records for covering 235.7 km nonstop journey by bicycle in 11 hours 57 minutes from Nigdi-Pandharpur, Maharashtra on 18th June 2022 at the age of 14 years 3 months 14 days.

The certificate of inclusion was bestowed to Child Prodigy Master Siddhesh Sachin Niphadkar digitally. Mr. Shukla briefed that Certificate of Record (CoR) is an authenticated document of the certification division of World Book of Records Limited which is bestowed upon a person, place or thing with maintaining specific standards to serve in a concerned field or respected area of activities. On being included by World Book of Records, London (UK), Child Prodigy Master Siddhesh Sachin Niphadkar was congratulated by members of the Central Working Committee of WBR and other dignitaries from international scenario. #WBR

","record_date":"2022-08-04","created":"2023-01-25","record_category":"0","show_on_achieving_lorel":"0","type":"","status":"Active","modified_date":"2023-02-10 13:28:40","modified_by":"0","is_deleted":"0","deleted_by":"0","delete_date":""},{"id":"1005","record_holder":"Child Prodigy Master Akshaj Nitish Dharm of Pune (Maharashtra) India gets included by World Book of Records","url":"child-prodigy-master-akshaj-nitish-dharm-of-pune--maharashtra--india-gets-included-by-world-book-of-records1005","sort":null,"image":"86741-akshaj-nitish-dharm.jpg","description":" For replying to 180 answers on the Ramayana in 38 minutes 49 seconds at the age of 05 years 02 months

Pune: Barrister Santosh Shukla (President and CEO, World Book of Records) has announced that Child Prodigy Master Akshaj Nitish Dharm of Pune (Maharashtra) India has been included by World Book of Records for replying 180 answers on the Ramayana in 38 minutes 49 seconds on 20 April 2022 at the age of 05 years 02 months. The certificate of inclusion was bestowed to Master Akshaj Nitish Dharm digitally.

Mr. Shukla briefed that Certificate of Record (CoR) is an authenticated document of the certification division of World Book of Records Limited which is bestowed upon a person, place or thing with maintaining specific standards to serve in a concerned field or respected area of activities. On being included by World Book of Records, London (UK), Child Prodigy Master Akshaj Nitish Dharm was congratulated by members of the Central Working Committee of WBR and other dignitaries from international scenario. #WBR
